casebody.data:
MACOMB COUNTY and AFSCME Council 25 and its Affiliated Local 893, Respondents-Appellees,
v.
John P. GREINER, Charging Party-Appellant. SC: 157489
COA: 334264 Supreme Court of Michigan. November 28, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion of charging party-appellant to exceed the page limitation for his motion for reconsideration is GRANTED. The motion submitted on November 20, 2018, is accepted for filing.
